com.movo.wave

Class BLEAgent.BLERequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movo.wave.BLEAgent.BLERequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BLEAgent.BLERequestScan, WaveRequest.BLERequestWaveOp
    Enclosing class:
    BLEAgent

    public abstract static class BLEAgent.BLERequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Request object for interacting with BLEAgent Executed one-at-a-time by the agent. The Agent switches to the specified device, sets it active, and then delegates request construction to the request. The BLEAgent then delegates received data to the request until the request indicates completion, or timeout occurs. note: all calls *probably* happen on the UI thread. As such, BLEAgent is mostly 'dumb' -- coms logic mostly lies in request.

        public BLERequest(BLEAgent.BLEDevice device,

        Specify device an timeout
        Parameters:
        device - BLEDevice required for this request, or null for no device.
        timeout - milliseconds before this request will timeout after it's begun.

      • dispatch

        public abstract boolean dispatch(BLEAgent agent)
        Send data using the current BLEAgent handles. Note, device services may not be discovered until the dispatch context. look at opBuildStack and buildOps.
        Parameters:
        agent - BLEAgent instance currently executing this request.
        Returns:
        indication of it the request has been completed.
